message: Bob, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Considering the inflation, taking this offer now would be to your advantage.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be reasonable. I propose a 55/45 split in your favor.  The inflation is working against you more than me, so a deal now is in both our best interests.
Bob, time is running out for me.  Let's meet in the middle - 52/48 sounds fair considering the circumstances.
